sn12.42:1.2: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti, catuhi ca sotapattiyangehi samannagato hoti, ariyo cassa nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho, so akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
sn12.42:2.1: Katamani panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti?
sn12.42:2.7: imani panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti.
sn12.42:4.1: Katamo cassa ariyo nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho?
sn12.42:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako paticcasamuppadanneva sadhukam yoniso manasi karoti …pe…
sn12.42:4.3: ayamassa ariyo nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho.
sn12.42:5.1: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imani panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti, imehi catuhi sotapattiyangehi samannagato hoti, ayancassa ariyo nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho, so akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
sn12.42:5.2: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato, sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’”ti.
